hadith.chapter: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer - كتاب الْمَسَاجِدِ وَمَوَاضِعِ الصَّلاَةِ
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثنا محمد بن المثنى، حدثنا ابن أبي عدي، عن سعيد، عن قتادة، بهذا الإسناد وقال ‏"‏ بيوتهم وقبورهم ‏"‏ ‏.‏ ولم يشك ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: This hadith has heed narrated by Qatada with the same chain of transmitters. And he said: Their houses and their graves (be filled with fire), and did not express doubt over the words," houses" and" graves".
